text: Need Morgan Morris for Mad Mex campaign. Budget around $22,720, looking for 2 x 3-minute vlog, 3 x Pinterest pin, 1 x Facebook post, 2 x 30-second Instagram reel. 6 week exclusivity from other similar brands. Campaign runs November 2025. Usage rights for 6 months. Engagement period: 4 months. Need to confirm: exclusivity period
